paragraphs.title: Configure GeoWave Session
paragraphs.text:
%sh
cd /home/hadoop
source geowave-env.sh

geowave config geoserver "$HOSTNAME:8000"

geowave config rmstore gdelt
geowave config addstore gdelt --gwNamespace geowave.gdelt -t hbase --zookeeper $HOSTNAME:2181

geowave config rmindex gdelt-spatial
geowave config addindex -t spatial gdelt-spatial --partitionStrategy round_robin --numPartitions $NUM_PARTITIONS

geowave config rmstore kmeans
geowave config addstore kmeans --gwNamespace geowave.kmeans -t hbase --zookeeper $HOSTNAME:2181

geowave config list

msg.data:
PROPERTIES (0.9.5-SNAPSHOT-config.properties)
geoserver.url: ip-10-0-0-106:8000
index.default-spatial-temporal.opts.bias: BALANCED
index.default-spatial-temporal.opts.maxDuplicates: -1
index.default-spatial-temporal.opts.numPartitions: 8
index.default-spatial-temporal.opts.partitionStrategy: HASH
index.default-spatial-temporal.opts.period: YEAR
index.default-spatial-temporal.type: spatial_temporal
index.default-spatial.opts.numPartitions: 8
index.default-spatial.opts.partitionStrategy: HASH
index.default-spatial.opts.storeTime: false
index.default-spatial.type: spatial
index.gdelt-spatial.opts.numPartitions: 32
index.gdelt-spatial.opts.partitionStrategy: ROUND_ROBIN
index.gdelt-spatial.opts.storeTime: false
index.gdelt-spatial.type: spatial
store.default-accumulo.opts.createTable: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.enableBlockCache: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.gwNamespace: geowave.default
store.default-accumulo.opts.instance: accumulo
store.default-accumulo.opts.password: geowave
store.default-accumulo.opts.persistAdapter: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.persistDataStatistics: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.persistIndex: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.useAltIndex: false
store.default-accumulo.opts.useLocalityGroups: true
store.default-accumulo.opts.user: geowave
store.default-accumulo.opts.zookeeper: localhost:2181
store.default-accumulo.type: accumulo
store.default-hbase.opts.createTable: true
store.default-hbase.opts.disableServer: false
store.default-hbase.opts.disableVerifyCoprocessors: false
store.default-hbase.opts.enableBlockCache: true
store.default-hbase.opts.gwNamespace: geowave.default
store.default-hbase.opts.persistAdapter: true
store.default-hbase.opts.persistDataStatistics: true
store.default-hbase.opts.persistIndex: true
store.default-hbase.opts.scanCacheSize: 2147483647
store.default-hbase.opts.useAltIndex: false

store.default-hbase.type: hbase
store.gdelt.opts.createTable: true
store.gdelt.opts.disableServer: false
store.gdelt.opts.disableVerifyCoprocessors: false
store.gdelt.opts.enableBlockCache: true
store.gdelt.opts.gwNamespace: geowave.gdelt
store.gdelt.opts.persistAdapter: true
store.gdelt.opts.persistDataStatistics: true
store.gdelt.opts.persistIndex: true
store.gdelt.opts.scanCacheSize: 2147483647
store.gdelt.opts.useAltIndex: false
store.gdelt.opts.zookeeper: ip-10-0-0-106:2181
store.gdelt.type: hbase
store.kmeans.opts.createTable: true
store.kmeans.opts.disableServer: false
store.kmeans.opts.disableVerifyCoprocessors: false
store.kmeans.opts.enableBlockCache: true
store.kmeans.opts.gwNamespace: geowave.kmeans
store.kmeans.opts.persistAdapter: true
store.kmeans.opts.persistDataStatistics: true
store.kmeans.opts.persistIndex: true
store.kmeans.opts.scanCacheSize: 2147483647
store.kmeans.opts.useAltIndex: false
store.kmeans.opts.zookeeper: ip-10-0-0-106:2181
store.kmeans.type: hbase

paragraphs.title: Add Layers to GeoServer
paragraphs.text:
%sh
# add gdelt layer
geowave gs addlayer gdelt -a all

# download and set the subsample style on gdelt
cd /mnt/tmp
wget s3.amazonaws.com/geowave/latest/scripts/emr/quickstart/SubsamplePoints.sld
geowave gs addstyle SubsamplePoints -sld /mnt/tmp/SubsamplePoints.sld
geowave gs setls -sn SubsamplePoints gdeltevent

# add kmeans layers and set styles
geowave gs addlayer kmeans -a all
geowave gs setls -sn point kmeans-centroids
geowave gs setls -sn line kmeans-hulls
